page.title: 11CRICKET IN LYDFORD
page.content: In Lydford some of the men play cricket in the Lydford Cricket Club.There is also a Women's Institute at Lydford.At "Ingo Brake" there are tennis courts that are open to the public.Also Mr.Declay gives Flute Lessons.(He owns "Ingo Brake")Miss Yeo and Mary Mazur give Piano Lessons also.In the summer a number of people go swimming at"Black Rock".This is a deep pool that is in The River Lyd.A lot of people that live around here enjoy going horse riding on their own ponies or ones hired from a Riding Stable.At our Village Hall there are many Jumble Sales and Fetes.There is also a Youth Club. So we have quite alot to do at Lydford after all!
